name: Donald Trump Simulator
description:
When America is in peril from the Mexicans, Donald must build a wall. But who is going to pay for the wall? That's right, the Mexicans! Join Trump in Mexico where he must brutally murder all of the Mexicans in order to gather a small loan of a million dollars and make America gr8 again!

A true master piece in the gaming world, with the amazing immersive story and beautiful soundtrack.

Made by ducksontheloose,

If you steal my game Ima sue your ass.

REVIEWS: (Totally not written by me)

"11/10"-ign

"Best soundtrack ever!"-The Daily Tuesday

"So accurate"-Donald Trump

"We wish our graphics were that good"-Bethesda

"This is some next gen stuff" -Microsoft

"Shaping the future of gaming"- My mum

DISCLAIMER-

This is not intended to be racist or offensive, It's all just for giggles
